aria-label.description: Defines the string that labels the checkbox element.

defaultChecked.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be initially checked.

disabled.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be disabled

focusable.description:
If `true` and `disabled` is passed, the checkbox will
remain tabbable but not interactive

form.description: The associate form of the underlying checkbox.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; input: string; control: string; label: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the checkbox. Useful for composition.

indeterminate.description:
If `true`, the checkbox will be indeterminate.
This only affects the icon shown inside checkbox
and does not modify the isChecked property.

invalid.description: If `true`, the checkbox is marked as invalid.

name.description:
The name of the input field in a checkbox
(Useful for form submission).

onChange.description: The callback invoked when the checked state of the `Checkbox` changes.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be readonly

required.description: If `true`, the checkbox input is marked as required,

value.description:
The value to be used in the checkbox input.
This is the value that will be returned on form submission.
